
muted Mute standard colour.
#### Description
Mute standard colour.
#### Usage
muted(colour, l = 30, c = 70)
#### Arguments
colour character vector of colours to modify
l new luminance
c new chroma
#### Examples
muted("red")
muted("blue")
show_col(c("red", "blue", muted("red"), muted("blue")))
26 number_bytes_format
